alert.note: Alert for Clark; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 9:46PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southern Nevada, including the following counties, in south central Nevada, Nye. In southern Nevada, Clark. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 946 PM PST, emergency management reported flooding occurring in the central and southern parts of the Pahrump Valley. Water originating out of Wallace Canyon appears to be contributing to the flooding. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pahrump. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
